# About Me
👨‍🔬 **Kamal Chhetri** | PhD Student | Plant Pathology | Virginia Tech University

Welcome to my GitHub site! I specialize in **Machine learning and its application in plant pathology, fungicide efficacy testing, metagenomics, and pathogen detection** in **corn disease research**. My work focuses on **bioinformatics** and **statistical analysis** to develop **decision-support tools** for agricultural disease management.
